item.title: Addin dragon claws to a 317 server
item.description:
@126 wrote:

Ok so ive added Part of it to my server and got the models required apparently in my models folder but they always end up under my feet when i put on heres the code i was given to put in class8.java

if(i == 8002)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.aString170 = “Dragon claws”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A set of fighting claws.”.getBytes();
class8.anInt174 = 13699;
class8.anInt181 = 630;
class8.anInt190 = 268;
class8.anInt198 = 1340;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -7;
class8.anInt194 = -13;
class8.anInt165 = 13698;
class8.anInt200 = 13698;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
}

if you can help this would be great
